Ground_Smash.help: All foes that pass through this Earthquake will be debuffed and may fall down.
Ground_Smash.targetHelp: You are shaken by the power of the blow, reducing your Defenses temporarily.

messages.attackerHit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Sweeping_Blow.help: This is a tremendous sweeping blow with your club. It will send most foes flying and crush many enemies. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow

Overhead_Smash.help: This is a massive overhead smash with your club. It will knock the target to the ground. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Slow
Overhead_Smash.targetHelp: You have been disoriented by the mighty club.

Noxious_Odor.help: You become a focus point for the Netherworld, allowing its Negative Energy to seep from your body. This will continuously damage all foes in melee range. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Fast
Noxious_Odor.targetHelp: The powerful stench of Jack in Irons is so bad it is physically painful.

Howling_Skull.targetHelp: The Howling Skull has reduced your Damage Resistance.

Gnome_Toss.help: Covers all foes near your target in clouds of Smoke. The villains are so blinded that they can hardly see a thing. Most villains will not be able to see past normal melee range, although some may have better perception. If the villains are attacked, they will be alerted to your presence, but will suffer a penalty to Accuracy. Recharge: Slow
Gnome_Toss.targetHelp: There is a Red Cap on your shoulders, beating you on the head and poking you in the eyes.
